sentences.en: a mound of filth and rubbish
Anyway, we don't want this kind of filth in our courtroom.
sentences.cn: 不管怎么样, 我们法庭不接受这种脏货.

sentences.en: Go and wash that filth off your hands.
sentences.cn: 去把你手上的脏东西洗掉.

sentences.en: He had got to plunge into the filthiest of filth.
sentences.cn: 他得投到最最肮脏的污秽中去.

sentences.en: I don’t know how you can watch that filth!
sentences.cn: 我不知道你怎么会看那种淫秽的东西！

sentences.en: I felt defiled by the filth.
sentences.cn: 我觉得这些脏话玷污了我.

sentences.en: I think you are filth. I think you are scum.
sentences.cn: 我觉得你是个脏东西. 我觉得你是个流氓.

sentences.en: Passing cars covered his shoes with filth.
sentences.cn: 来往的车辆弄得他鞋子上全是脏东西。
生活在肮脏环境里的人

sentences.en: The dialogue was all filth and innuendo.
sentences.cn: 这段对话全是下流的言辞和影射。

sentences.en: The filth here deters all but the invited guest.
sentences.cn: 这里污秽不堪,除非有事,外人是裹足不前的.

sentences.en: The floor was covered in grease and filth.
sentences.cn: 地板上满是油垢和污物。

sentences.en: The gutters were choked with filth.
The living-room floor was littered with filth and tin cans.
sentences.cn: 客厅地上丢满了脏东西和罐头听。

sentences.en: The river and ponds have been covered with filth for years.
sentences.cn: 这条河和这些池塘已经被污物覆盖好多年了.

sentences.en: They were selfish filth who sacrificed their families.
sentences.cn: 他们牺牲了自己的家庭,那是很自私的.

sentences.en: Thousands of tons of filth and sewage pour into the Ganges every day.
sentences.cn: 每天都有成千上万吨污物和废水排入恒河。

sentences.en: We removed the accumulated filth of years from it with a cloth - brush.
sentences.cn: 我们用抹布擦去了它上面的积垢.

trans.tran_en: dirt, especially a lot of it
